title: Param Shopping Marketing App

requirements.text: Create a marketing landing page for 'Param Shopping' (app ID: com.paramshopping.app) that includes a hero section with the app name and tagline, a features/benefits section highlighting the shopping app's key value propositions, a call-to-action section (e.g., 'Download Now' or 'Get Started'), and a footer with the app ID branding.

quotes: Create a marketing app of the URL id com.paramshopping.app

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays 'Param Shopping' as the app name prominently
Hero section includes a compelling tagline and primary CTA button
Features section lists at least 3 shopping app benefits with icons or visuals
Page is fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop

requirements.text: Apply a vibrant, modern e-commerce visual theme to the marketing app using warm accent colors (e.g., orange/red/coral tones), clean sans-serif typography, and a layout that feels energetic and trustworthy. Enforce the theme consistently across all sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette with warm accent tones used throughout
Typography is clean and readable with clear visual hierarchy
All sections follow the same design language
Visual theme feels appropriate for a shopping/retail app

requirements.text: Store and expose basic marketing content (app name, tagline, feature list, CTA text) from the backend so the frontend can fetch and render it dynamically.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor exposes a query function to retrieve marketing content
Marketing content includes app name, tagline, list of features, and CTA label
Frontend successfully fetches and renders content from the backend

constraints: App package/URL ID must be com.paramshopping.app â€” use this consistently in branding and footer
All user-facing text must be in English
nonGoals: Actual e-commerce or shopping functionality (cart, checkout, product listings)

required: Vibrant shopping bag logo with a stylized 'P' monogram in warm orange tones on a clean white background (param-shopping-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Wide marketing hero banner with abstract shopping and retail elements, warm gradient background in coral and orange tones (hero-banner.dim_1440x600.png)
